sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Good morning, Europe. It's Thursday, the 17th of February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Let's start by looking at our top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The European Union is urging Russia to de-escalate the tensions at the Ukrainian border, despite Moscow saying it's withdrawing troops at Crimea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The EU has also offered Kiev a 1.2 billion euros macro financial loan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It's day two for NATO defence ministers to discuss the Russian-Ukraine tensions, as it says there's no sign of Russian troops withdrawing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And the Golden Bear was awarded to the Spanish film Alcaraz at the Berlinale Film Festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It was filmmaker Carla Simone's second movie she's made and was shot near Barcelona.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A united European Union has added its voice to the chorus urging Russia to de-escalate the situation at the Ukrainian border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The European Council president has called for tangible action from Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Fears that a Russian invasion of Ukraine is imminent may appear to have eased, but they have not gone away. In the last two days, Russia has signalled that it may be open to diplomacy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: And we urge Russia to take concrete and tangible steps towards the escalation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Because this is the condition for sincere political dialogue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We cannot eternally attempt diplomacy on one side, while the other side is amassing troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The fast-tracking of the Commission's 1.2 billion euro macro-financial loan to help Ukraine passed the final parliamentary hurdle on Wednesday evening.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's external financing has dried up due to Russia's military threat and the worsening economic situation in the wake of the pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In Ukraine itself, February 16 saw President Volodymyr Zelensky on a mission to rally the troops and the morale of ordinary Ukrainians in case Russian tanks begin to cross into the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: VOLODYMYR ZELENSKY, Ukrainian President We are not afraid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Whatever is forecasted, we are not afraid of any people, any enemy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We are not afraid of any dates because we will defend ourselves both on 16th February and on the 17th and in March and in April and in September and in December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And no matter what day and month.

sentences.sentence: Despite Western disbelief, Russia says it has withdrawn some of its troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Images released by its Ministry of Defense show joint training maneuvers with Belarusian units.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Minsk says not a single Russian soldier will remain in the country when the drills are finished.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Is Russia withdrawing its forces from near Ukraine? The latest Ukrainian intelligence report shows no signs of that. According to the Ukrainian military, there are about 140,000 combined Russian military and pro-Russian separatist forces amassed near Ukrainian borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy said when the withdrawal happens, everybody will be able to see it. The president, the authorities and the Ukrainian people, millions of them who have been living with these tensions for years now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: And on the National Unity Day declared by Zelenskyy, they would want nothing more than to get the proofs of that withdrawal and of de-escalation of the current situation sasha vakulina euronews nato defense ministers are meeting in brussels today for the second day in a row to discuss the ongoing tensions with russia over ukraine speaking after the first day in a row to discuss the ongoing tensions with Russia over Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Speaking after the first day of talks, the NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg said that despite the cautious optimism, there were still no signs from Moscow of any withdrawal of troops or equipment and that this was the new normal. In a statement, allies said that they were still very concerned by the very large-scale, unprovoked and unjustified Russian military build-up in and around Ukraine and in Belarus, and they urged Russia to choose diplomacy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But Jens Stoltenberg also told reporters that NATO is considering what we reported yesterday, which is beefing up battlegroups in the southeast of Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But onlookers argue that this risks antagonising Moscow.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But for the head of NATO Jens Stoltenberg, this is a necessary move to show Russian authorities that the aggression will be met by further NATO presence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Maeve McMahon, Euronews, Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hungary's government, led by Prime Minister Viktor Orbán, expressed its anger after the EU's highest court ruled in favour of making EU cash handouts conditional on a country's respect for rule of law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A large recipient of EU funds, Hungary has come under criticism for denying the rights of LGBTQ people under the so-called child protection law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Today, the Court of Justice of the European Union has made a political decision on the Hungarian Child Protection Law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We are not really surprised because the President of the Court had already mentioned that the result of the judgment will be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But we see that in the Child Protection Law debate, the Court of Justice of the European Union has become a political stand.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Poland has also challenged the court's decision by claiming the EU lacks a proper legal basis and agrees with Hungary that the ECJ is interfering in domestic politics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Both Poland and Hungary say that drawing a link between finances and the legal decisions of national governments amounts to blackmail from Brussels.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, today's ruling of the Court of Justice of the European Union confirms the dangerous tendency of the ECJ and the EU institutions to go beyond the EU treaties and the functioning of law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Poland has appealed against these provisions because it believed that they went beyond the EU treaties accepted by the EU countries, accepted by individual nations via referendums or proceedings that are in force in a specific country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: These EU funds could now be withheld because of the European Court of Justice's ruling, Poland has yet to receive some 36 billion euros from the EU's pandemic recovery fund, while Hungary's 7 billion euros are also being held up. Thank you. Liverpool's 2-0 win over Inter Milan in Italy has put them in the running for a place in the Champions League quarter-finals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The goals came in the last 15 minutes from Roberto Firmino and Mohamed Salah.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Second leg in three weeks in Liverpool, with the Reds, who had won the Champions League in 2019, hungry for more.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In the other match of the evening, Red Bull Salzburg almost created a surprise at home against Bayern Munich.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: They led from the 20th minute, but the Bavarians managed to equalize at the very end of the match through Kingsley Coman.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Salzburg, playing its first game at this level, rose to the occasion and can look forward to another good match.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On the 12th day of the Winter Games, Clément Noël claimed France's first Alpine skiing gold medal of the Beijing Olympics when he won the men's slalom.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Austrian Johannes Strolz took silver while Norwegian Sebastian Fossolovac claimed bronze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hanna Strots took silver while Norwegian Sebastian Fossanova claimed bronze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Germany's team has been crowned Olympic champions in the cross-country skiing women's team sprint classic after a nail-biting finish.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sweden took silver and the Russian Olympic Committee claimed the bronze medal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Swedish team raced to their first women's 4x6km relay gold medal in the biathlon competition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They finished 12 seconds ahead of the Russian Olympic Committee and Germany rounded at the podium, winning the bronze medal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Alexander Hall won freestyle skiing gold in the men's slope style as the USA claimed a 1-2 on the podium in Beijing. The American Nicholas Gopar took silver as Sweden's Jesper Tjader finished in bronze.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The men's Canadian short track relay team struck gold.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The speed skaters finished ahead of the Republic of Korea and Italy in a frantic race to capture the gold medal in the 5,000-meter final.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Norway is on top of the podium with 28 medals, including 13 gold. Germany is second with 20 medals, including 10 gold ones.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And the U.S. has 19 medals in total, placing it narrowly behind in third place.
